name: St3ck
description:
A simple match 3 card game which is a bit harder to master.

Games take around 5-15 minutes depending on your luck and skills :)

The rules of the game:

  • Match 3 different colors vertically to clear them
  • grab a card when you have 3 of the same color horizontally or 3 different vertically
  • Give to 2 cards to your opponent when you clear your hand
  • Clear your hand and deck first to win

Go to st3ck.com for the full game!
